original_text: Evil thoughts come out from people's minds. As a result, they do wrong things. They murder people. They have sex with another man's wife. They have sex in other wrong ways. They rob people. They tell lies about other people. They insult people.
korean_text: 마음에서 나오는 것은 악한 생각과 살인과 간음과 음란과 도둑질과 거짓 증언과 비방이니

sentences.original_text: Evil thoughts come out from people's minds.
As a result, they do wrong things.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과, 그들은 잘못된 일을 합니다.

sentences.original_text: They have sex with another man's wife.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다른 사람의 아내와 성관계를 합니다.

sentences.original_text: They have sex in other wrong ways.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다른 잘못된 방식으로 성관계를 합니다.

sentences.original_text: They tell lies about other people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다른 사람에 대해 거짓말을 합니다.
